title: The benefits code: benefits and reimbursed expenses not chargeable to tax: table

details.body:
## Part 4 ITEPA 2003 The following benefits and expenses reimbursed are not chargeable to tax under Part 3 Chapter 10 ITEPA 2003, mostly because of exemptions within Part 4 ITEPA 2003 but also by deduction (e.g. security assets and services). In the table all section references are to ITEPA 2003.
**Benefits not chargeable**  **Legislation** **Relevant Instructions**
Accommodation, supplies and services provided and used on the employer's premises Section 316 [EIM21610](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21601#EIM21610)
Annual parties and other social events Section 264 [EIM21670](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21603#EIM21670) onwards
Bicycles Section 244 [EIM21664](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21601#EIM21664)
Car, motor cycle and bicycle parking facilities at or near the place of work Section 237 [EIM21685](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21602#EIM21685)
Childcare See “Employer supported childcare” [EIM21900](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM20000#EIM21900)
Entertainment provided by third parties Section 265 [EIM21835](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21604#EIM21835)
Equipment provided to employees with a disability Section 210 [EIM21846](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21602#EIM21846)
Heavier commercial vehicles Section 238 [EIM22900](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22900) onwards
Leave travel facilities of members of the Armed Forces Section 296 [EIM21733](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21603#EIM21733)
Meals in a canteen provided for employer's staff generally Section 317 [EIM21670](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21603#EIM21670) onwards
Medical treatment necessary when employee falls ill on duties abroad Section 325 [EIM21766](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21603#EIM21766)
Pool cars Section 167(2) [EIM23450](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM23000#EIM23450)
Provision of a pension or similar benefit to be given on death or retirement Section 307 [EIM21800](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21603#EIM21800)
Reimbursed expenses of a provided car Section 239(1) [EIM23035](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM23010#EIM23035)
Security assets and services where special threat to employee Sections 377 [EIM21810](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21604#EIM21810) onwards
Sick pay schemes: employers' contributions Section 202(3) [EIM21820](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21241#EIM21820)
Sports facilities Section 261 [EIM21825](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21604#EIM21825) onwards
Structural alterations to provided living accommodation Section 313 [EIM21620](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21601#EIM21620)
Supplies and services other than on an employer's premises Section 316(4) [EIM21611](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21601#EIM21611) onwards
Workplace nurseries Section 318 [EIM21900](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM20000#EIM21900) onwards
Works buses and subsidies to public bus services Sections 242 and 243 [EIM21850](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21604#EIM21850) and [EIM21855](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21604#EIM21855)
